name: 阿利斯泰尔·班克斯·格里芬
awards: 2019年 第35届圣丹斯电影节 观众奖 未来创新奖 (提名) 破晓时分
name_full: 阿利斯泰尔·班克斯·格里芬 Alistair Banks Griffin
introduction: Alistair Banks Griffin is a film director, writer, editor, producer and cinematographer.After receiving a BA at Rhode Island School of Design, Alistair Banks Griffin directed a short film, Gauge, which premiered at the 2008 New York Film Festival.In 2009 he received a Cinereach grant for his first feature film, Two Gates of Sleep, which premiered at the 2010 Cannes Film Festival and won grand prize at CPH PIX.
